# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $999999. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable asset to your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $999,999. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $999,999
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
